Challenge: Ultra Reliable Protocol (https://trojanc.tf/challenges#Ultra%20Reliable%20Protocol-2)

Bob does not trust Alice to receive his messages, so he added an acknowledgement to them. 
That way, Alice will definitely get the flag!

Solution:

$ nc urp-chall.trojanc.tf 5000
Bob says: Message 1 is 
Bob says: Message 2 is 
Receiving message 1: 
Alice says: Ack message 1 TODORANDOMSTRINGACK 
Receiving message 2: 
Alice says: Ack message 2 TODORANDOMSTRINGACK, 

Acknoledge string is probably added after or before the plaintext of the message, 
so inverting them could solve decrypt the not ack part:

$ nc urp-chall.trojanc.tf 5000
Bob says: Message 1 is 
Bob says: Message 2 is 
Receiving message 1: 
Alice says: Ack message 1 _easily_misused} 
Receiving message 2: 
Alice says: Ack message 2 Trojan{keys_are,

So the flag is: Trojan{keys_are_easily_misused}
